hedline.hl1: Driver Who Tried to Hit Officer Is Shot, Police Say

abstract.p: Jersey City, NJ, Police Officer Michael Cervino shoots and wounds man who tried to hit him with car (S)

block.p: A police officer shot and wounded a man who tried to hit him with a car last night, the police said.

Two officers had pulled the car over around 7:30 p.m. on Van Nostrand Avenue near Martin Luther King Jr. Drive on the south side of the city, said Sgt. Edgar Martinez, a police spokesman. It was not clear why they had stopped the car.
A police officer shot and wounded a man who tried to hit him with a car last night, the police said.

Two officers had pulled the car over around 7:30 p.m. on Van Nostrand Avenue near Martin Luther King Jr. Drive on the south side of the city, said Sgt. Edgar Martinez, a police spokesman. It was not clear why they had stopped the car.

After Officer Michael Cervino got out of his car, the driver of the other car tried to run him down, and Officer Cervino fired into the car, hitting the driver in the arm and leg, Sergeant Martinez said.
The driver, whose name was not immediately released, was under arrest at Jersey City Medical Center, where he was being treated. Charges were pending last night.
